description: Creates a new accessor for use with Amazon Managed Blockchain service that supports token based access. The accessor contains information required for token based access.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: This is a unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the operation. An idempotent operation completes no more than once. This identifier is required only if you make a service request directly using an HTTP client. It is generated automatically if you use an Amazon Web Services SDK or the Amazon Web Services CLI. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags to assign to the Accessor. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value. You can specify multiple key-value pairs in a single request with an overall maximum of 50 tags allowed per resource. For more information about tags, see Tagging Resources in the Amazon Managed Blockchain Ethereum Developer Guide, or Tagging Resources in the Amazon Managed Blockchain Hyperledger Fabric Developer Guide. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description: The blockchain network that the Accessor token is created for.

nested_items.name: AccessorId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the accessor.

nested_items.name: BillingToken
nested_items.description: The billing token is a property of the Accessor. Use this token to when making calls to the blockchain network. The billing token is used to track your accessor token for billing requests.

nested_items.name: NetworkType
nested_items.description: The blockchain network that the accessor token is created for.
